00064 
00065 uvm_ml_packed_obj::uvm_ml_packed_obj() :
00066   size(0), val(0), max_words(0) {
00067 }
00068 
00069 uvm_ml_packed_obj::~uvm_ml_packed_obj() {
00070   if (val) {
00071     delete[] val;
00072   }
00073 }
00074 
00075 void uvm_ml_packed_obj::allocate(uvm_ml_packed_obj* v, unsigned nwords) {
00076   if (v->max_words >= nwords)
00077     return;
00078   // need to allocate new m/m
00079   v->max_words = nwords;
00080   if (v->val) {
00081     delete[] v->val;
00082   }
00083   v->val = new unsigned[v->max_words];
00084 }

00377 static bp_frmw_c_api_struct* uvm_ml_sc_get_required_api()
00378 {
00379     bp_frmw_c_api_struct * required_api = new bp_frmw_c_api_struct();
00380     memset(required_api, '\0', sizeof(bp_frmw_c_api_struct));
00381     required_api->set_trace_mode_ptr= uvm_ml_tlm_rec::set_debug_mode;
00382     required_api->startup_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::startup;
00383     required_api->construct_top_ptr=uvm_ml_tlm_rec::construct_top;
00384 
00385     // ----- Phasing APIs
00386     required_api->transmit_phase_ptr = uvm_ml_phase::transmit_phase;
00387     required_api->notify_phase_ptr = uvm_ml_phase::notify_phase;
00388     required_api->notify_runtime_phase_ptr = uvm_ml_phase::notify_runtime_phase;
00389 
00390     required_api->find_connector_id_by_name_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::find_connector_id_by_name;
00391     required_api->get_connector_intf_name_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::get_connector_intf_name;
00392     required_api->is_export_connector_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::is_export_connector;
00393     required_api->try_put_uvm_ml_stream_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::nb_put;
00394     required_api->can_put_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::can_put;
00395     required_api->put_uvm_ml_stream_request_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::request_put;
00396     required_api->get_uvm_ml_stream_request_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::request_get;
00397     required_api->get_requested_uvm_ml_stream_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::get_requested;
00398     required_api->try_get_uvm_ml_stream_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::nb_get;
00399     required_api->can_get_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::can_get;
00400     required_api->peek_uvm_ml_stream_request_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::request_peek;
00401     required_api->peek_requested_uvm_ml_stream_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::peek_requested;
00402     required_api->try_peek_uvm_ml_stream_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::nb_peek;
00403     required_api->can_peek_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::can_peek;
00404     required_api->transport_uvm_ml_stream_request_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::request_transport;
00405     required_api->transport_response_uvm_ml_stream_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::transport_response;
00406     required_api->nb_transport_uvm_ml_stream_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::nb_transport;
00407     required_api->write_uvm_ml_stream_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::write;
00408     required_api->notify_end_blocking_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::notify_end_blocking;
00409     required_api->tlm2_b_transport_request_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::tlm2_b_transport_request;
00410     required_api->tlm2_b_transport_response_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::tlm2_b_transport_response;
00411     required_api->tlm2_nb_transport_fw_ptr =  uvm_ml_tlm_rec::tlm2_nb_transport_fw;
00412     required_api->tlm2_nb_transport_bw_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::tlm2_nb_transport_bw;
00413     required_api->tlm2_transport_dbg_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::tlm2_transport_dbg;
00414     required_api->tlm2_turn_off_transaction_mapping_ptr = (uvm_ml_tlm_rec::tlm2_turn_off_transaction_mapping);
00415     required_api->synchronize_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::synchronize;
00416 
00417     required_api->create_child_junction_node_ptr = uvm_ml_tlm_rec::create_child_junction_node;
00418 
00419     required_api->notify_config_ptr = uvm_ml_config_rsrc::notify_config;
00420     required_api->notify_resource_ptr = uvm_ml_config_rsrc::notify_resource;
00421 
00422     return required_api;
00423 };

00433 #include "uvm_ml_adapter_imp_spec.cpp"
00434 
00435 // this belongs in uvm_ml_hierarchy.cpp
00436 map<uvm_component*,unsigned>proxy_parents;
00437 
00438 
00439 int unsigned get_hierarchical_node_id(uvm_component *comp) {
00440   static int unsigned next_id = 0;
00441   map<uvm_component*, unsigned>::iterator it;
00442   
00443   it = proxy_parents.find(comp);
00444   if(it == proxy_parents.end()) {
00445     proxy_parents.insert(pair<uvm_component*,unsigned>(comp,next_id++));
00446     return next_id-1;
00447   } else
00448     return it->second;
00449 
00450 } // get_hierarchical_node_id
00451 
00452 child_component_proxy::child_component_proxy(sc_module_name nm): uvm_ml_special_component(nm) {
00453 
00454     //get_config_string("uvm_ml_parent_name", m_parent_name);
00455     //get_config_string("uvm_ml_type_name",   m_component_type_name);
00456     //get_config_string("uvm_ml_inst_name",   m_instance_name);
00457     //get_config_string("uvm_ml_frmw_id",     m_target_frmw_ind);
00458 
00459     uvm_get_config_string("uvm_ml_parent_name", m_parent_name);
00460     uvm_get_config_string("uvm_ml_type_name",   m_component_type_name);
00461     uvm_get_config_string("uvm_ml_inst_name",   m_instance_name);
00462     uvm_get_config_string("uvm_ml_frmw_id",     m_target_frmw_ind);
00463 
00464     uvm_component *p = get_parent();
00465     m_parent_id = get_hierarchical_node_id(p);
00466 
00467     m_child_junction_node_id = BP(create_child_junction_node)(framework_id,
00468                                                               m_target_frmw_ind.c_str(), 
00469                                                               m_component_type_name.c_str(),
00470                                                               m_instance_name.c_str(),
00471                                                               m_parent_name.c_str(),
00472                                                               m_parent_id);
00473     if(m_child_junction_node_id == -1) {
00474       char msg[1024];
00475       sprintf(msg,"\ntype name is %s; instance name is %s; framework is %s", m_component_type_name.c_str(), m_instance_name.c_str(), m_target_frmw_ind.c_str());
00476       UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: Failed to create child proxy", msg);
00477     }
00478 }
00479 
00480 void child_component_proxy::phase_started(uvm_phase *phase) { 
00481     char * phase_name  = const_cast<char*>(phase->get_name().c_str());
00482     char * phase_group = const_cast<char*>(phase->get_schedule()->basename());
00483 
00484   int res = BP(transmit_phase)(framework_id, m_target_frmw_ind.c_str(), m_child_junction_node_id, phase_group, phase_name, UVM_ML_PHASE_STARTED);
00485   if(res == 0) {
00486     UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: phase_started failed, framework does not exist", "");
00487   }
00488 }
00489 
00490 void child_component_proxy::phase_ready_to_end(uvm_phase *phase) { 
00491     char * phase_name  = const_cast<char*>(phase->get_name().c_str());
00492     char * phase_group = const_cast<char*>(phase->get_schedule()->basename());
00493 
00494   int res = BP(transmit_phase)(framework_id, m_target_frmw_ind.c_str(), m_child_junction_node_id, phase_group, phase_name, UVM_ML_PHASE_READY_TO_END);
00495   if(res == 0) {
00496     UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: phase_ready_to_end failed, framework does not exist", "");
00497   }
00498 }

00545     UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: check_phase failed, framework does not exist", "");
00546   }
00547 }
00548 
00549 void child_component_proxy::report_phase(uvm_phase *phase) { 
00550   int res = BP(transmit_phase)(framework_id, m_target_frmw_ind.c_str(), m_child_junction_node_id, "common", "report", UVM_ML_PHASE_EXECUTING);
00551   if(res == 0) {
00552     UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: report_phase failed, framework does not exist", "");
00553   }
00554 }
00555 
00556 void child_component_proxy::final_phase(uvm_phase *phase) { 
00557   int res = BP(transmit_phase)(framework_id, m_target_frmw_ind.c_str(), m_child_junction_node_id, "common", "final", UVM_ML_PHASE_EXECUTING);
00558   if(res == 0) {
00559     UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: final_phase failed, framework does not exist", "");
00560   }
00561 }

00567 
00568 void report_tlm1_error(uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base* rec) {
00569   char msg[1024];
00570   if (rec) {
00571     sprintf(msg, "\nSystemC export name is '%s'\n"
00572             "TLM1 interface is '%s'\n"
00573             "uvm_object payload type is '%s'\n", 
00574             rec->object()->name(), 
00575             rec->get_intf_name().c_str(), 
00576             rec->get_REQ_name().c_str()
00577            );
00578     SC_REPORT_WARNING(ML_UVM_RUN_TIME_ERROR_, msg);
00579   } else {
00580     SC_REPORT_WARNING(ML_UVM_RUN_TIME_ERROR_, "\n");
00581   }
00582   CURRENT_SIMCONTEXT_SET_ERROR();
00583 }
00584 
00585 void report_connector_error(ml_tlm2_connector_base* conn) {
00586   char msg[1024];
00587   if (conn) {
00588     sprintf(msg, "\nTLM2 connector\n");
00589     SC_REPORT_WARNING(ML_UVM_RUN_TIME_ERROR_, msg);
00590   } else {
00591     SC_REPORT_WARNING(ML_UVM_RUN_TIME_ERROR_, "\n");
00592   }
00593   CURRENT_SIMCONTEXT_SET_ERROR();
00594 }

00603 
00604 uvm_ml_tlm_conn_info::uvm_ml_tlm_conn_info(string name, unsigned id) {
00605   m_name = name;
00606   m_id = id;
00607   m_object = sc_find_object(name.c_str());
00608   if (!m_object) {
00609     char msg[1024];
00610     sprintf(msg, "\nPort/export is '%s' \n", name.c_str());
00611     SC_REPORT_ERROR(ML_UVM_OBJ_NOT_FOUND_, msg);
00612     return;
00613   }
00614 }
00615 
00616 unsigned uvm_ml_utils::m_nextid = 1;   
00617 
00618 bool uvm_ml_utils::m_quasi_static_elaboration_started = false;
00619 
00620 bool uvm_ml_utils::m_quasi_static_end_of_construction = false;
00621 
00622 sc_strhash<uvm_ml_tlm_conn_info*>* uvm_ml_utils::conn_info_by_name = 0;
00623 
00624 map<unsigned,uvm_ml_tlm_conn_info*>* uvm_ml_utils::conn_info_by_id = 0;
00625 
00626 map<sc_object*, uvm_ml_tlm_transrec_base*>* uvm_ml_utils::obj_transrec_map = 0;
00627 
00628 map<std::string, unsigned>* uvm_ml_utils::socket_map = 0;
00629 
00630 map<unsigned, ml_tlm2_connector_base*>* uvm_ml_utils::connector_map = 0;
00631 
00632 
00633 void uvm_ml_utils::add_socket(string s, ml_tlm2_connector_base* conn) {
00634   pair<map<string,unsigned>::iterator,bool> ret_soc; 
00635   pair<map<unsigned, ml_tlm2_connector_base*>::iterator,bool> ret_conn; 
00636 
00637   if (!socket_map) {
00638     socket_map = new map<std::string, unsigned>();
00639   }
00640   conn->conn_id = m_nextid++;
00641   ret_soc = socket_map->insert(pair<string,unsigned>(s,conn->conn_id));
00642   if (!connector_map) {
00643     connector_map = new map<unsigned, ml_tlm2_connector_base*>();
00644   }
00645   ret_conn = connector_map->insert(pair<unsigned,ml_tlm2_connector_base*>(conn->conn_id,conn));
00646   //connector_map[m_nextid-1] = conn;
00647 }
00648 
00649 ml_tlm2_connector_base* uvm_ml_utils::get_ml_tlm2_connector_base(unsigned target_connector_id)
00650   {
00651     map<unsigned, ml_tlm2_connector_base*>::iterator it;
00652 
00653     it = connector_map->find(target_connector_id);
00654     if (it == connector_map->end()) return 0;
00655     return connector_map->find(target_connector_id)->second;
00656   }
00657 
00658 unsigned uvm_ml_utils::find_socket_id(string s) {
00659   if (socket_map == NULL) return 0;
00660 
00661   map<string,unsigned>::iterator it;
00662   it = socket_map->find(s);
00663   if (it == socket_map->end()) return 0;
00664   return socket_map->find(s)->second;
00665 }
00666 
00667 bool uvm_ml_utils::is_tlm2_connector(unsigned connector_id) {
00668   if (uvm_ml_utils::connector_map == NULL) return false;
00669 
00670   map<unsigned, ml_tlm2_connector_base*>::iterator it;
00671 
00672   it = uvm_ml_utils::connector_map->find(connector_id);
00673   if (it == uvm_ml_utils::connector_map->end()) 
00674     return false;
00675   else
00676     return true;
00677 }
00678 
00679 void uvm_ml_utils::add_transrec_to_map(
00680   sc_object* obj, 
00681   uvm_ml_tlm_transrec_base* tr
00682 ) {
00683   if (!obj_transrec_map) {
00684     obj_transrec_map = new map<sc_object*, uvm_ml_tlm_transrec_base*>();
00685   }
00686   (*obj_transrec_map)[obj] = tr;
00687 }
00688 
00689 uvm_ml_tlm_transrec_base* uvm_ml_utils::get_transrec(sc_object* obj) {
00690   if (!obj_transrec_map) return 0;
00691   return (*obj_transrec_map)[obj];
00692 }
00693 
00694 uvm_ml_tlm_conn_info* uvm_ml_utils::get_or_create_conn_info(string name) {
00695   if (!conn_info_by_name) {
00696     conn_info_by_name = new sc_strhash<uvm_ml_tlm_conn_info*>();
00697   }
00698   if (!conn_info_by_id) {
00699     conn_info_by_id = new map<unsigned,uvm_ml_tlm_conn_info*>();
00700   }
00701   uvm_ml_tlm_conn_info* info = get_conn_info(name);
00702   if (!info) {
00703     unsigned id = m_nextid++;
00704     info = new uvm_ml_tlm_conn_info(name,id);
00705   }
00706   (*conn_info_by_id)[info->id()] = info;
00707   conn_info_by_name->insert(strdup(name.c_str()),info);
00708   return info;
00709 }
00710 
00711 uvm_ml_tlm_conn_info* uvm_ml_utils::get_conn_info(string name) {
00712   std::string s;
00713   s = name;
00714   if (!conn_info_by_name) return 0;
00715   return (*conn_info_by_name)[s.c_str()];
00716 }
00717 
00718 uvm_ml_tlm_conn_info* uvm_ml_utils::get_conn_info(unsigned id) {
00719   if (!conn_info_by_id) return 0;
00720   return (*conn_info_by_id)[id];
00721 }

00733 static map<unsigned, double> call_id_delay_value_dict;

00736   return framework_id;

00744 
00745 bool uvm_ml_utils::is_tree_node_quasi_static(unsigned root_node_id)
00746 {
00747   return root_node_id >= static_top_names.size();
00748 }
00749 
00750 sc_module * uvm_ml_utils::get_quasi_static_tree_node_by_id(unsigned node_id)
00751 {
00752  char msg[1024];
00753   if(!((node_id >= static_top_names.size()) && (node_id < static_top_names.size() + quasi_static_tree_nodes.size()))) {
00754     sprintf(msg,"\nID is %d", node_id);
00755     UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: Subtree node was not found",msg);
00756     return NULL;
00757   };
00758   //assert ((node_id >= static_top_names.size()) && (node_id < static_top_names.size() + quasi_static_tree_nodes.size())); // Otherwise an internal error
00759   return quasi_static_tree_nodes[node_id - static_top_names.size()];
00760 }
00761 
00762 // TLM2
00763 static uvm_ml_time_unit m_time_unit = TIME_UNIT_UNDEFINED;
00764 static double           m_time_value = -1;
00765 
00766 unsigned int uvm_ml_tlm_trans::tlm2_nb_transport_bw(
00767       unsigned         connector_id,
00768       MLUPO *          val,
00769       unsigned int *   phase,
00770       unsigned int     transaction_id,
00771       sc_time_unit *   delay_unit,
00772       double *         delay_value
00773 ) {
00774   unsigned int ret;
00775   unsigned *ptr;
00776 
00777   ptr = val->val; // save pointer
00778   ret = (unsigned int) BP(nb_transport_bw)(
00779                                       framework_id,
00780                                       connector_id,
00781                                       &(val->size),
00782                                       &(val->val),
00783                                       (uvm_ml_tlm_phase *)phase,
00784                                       transaction_id,
00785                                       (uvm_ml_time_unit *) delay_unit,
00786                                       delay_value,
00787                                       m_time_unit,
00788                                       m_time_value
00789                                       );
00790   if(val->val != ptr) delete[] ptr; // delete old value if it was reassigned
00791   return ret;
00792 }
00793 
00794 unsigned int uvm_ml_tlm_trans::tlm2_nb_transport_fw(
00795       unsigned         connector_id,
00796       MLUPO *          val,
00797       unsigned int *   phase,
00798       unsigned int     transaction_id,
00799       sc_time_unit *   delay_unit,
00800       double *         delay_value 
00801 ) {
00802   unsigned int ret;
00803   unsigned *ptr;
00804 
00805   ptr = val->val; // save pointer
00806   ret = (unsigned int) BP(nb_transport_fw)(
00807                                       framework_id,
00808                                       connector_id,
00809                                       &(val->size),
00810                                       &(val->val),
00811                                       (uvm_ml_tlm_phase *)phase,
00812                                       transaction_id,
00813                                       (uvm_ml_time_unit *) delay_unit,
00814                                       delay_value, 
00815                                       m_time_unit,
00816                                       m_time_value
00817                                       );
00818   if(val->val != ptr) delete[] ptr; // delete old value if it was reassigned
00819   return ret;
00820 }
00821 
00822 unsigned uvm_ml_tlm_trans::tlm2_transport_dbg(
00823       unsigned              connector_id,
00824       MLUPO *               val 
00825 ) {
00826   unsigned int ret;
00827   unsigned *ptr;
00828 
00829   ptr = val->val; // save pointer
00830   ret = BP(transport_dbg)(
00831                                       framework_id,
00832                                       connector_id,
00833                                       &(val->size),
00834                                       &(val->val),
00835                                       m_time_unit,
00836                                       m_time_value
00837                                       );
00838   if(val->val != ptr) delete[] ptr; // delete old value if it was reassigned
00839   return ret;
00840 }
00841 
00842 void uvm_ml_tlm_trans::tlm2_b_transport(
00843       unsigned         connector_id,
00844       MLUPO *          val,
00845       sc_time_unit *   delay_unit,
00846       double *         delay_value
00847 ) {
00848   unsigned *ptr;
00849   unsigned call_id = fake_blocking_call_id++;
00850   unsigned done = 0;
00851 
00852   ptr = val->val; // save pointer
00853   int disable = BP(request_b_transport_tlm2)(
00854                                       framework_id,
00855                                       connector_id,
00856                                       call_id,
00857                                       &(val->size),
00858                                       &(val->val),
00859                                       (uvm_ml_time_unit)*delay_unit,
00860                                       *delay_value,
00861                                       &done,
00862                                       m_time_unit,
00863                                       m_time_value
00864                                       );
00865   if(val->val != ptr) delete[] ptr; // delete old value if it was reassigned
00866 
00867   if (!done) {
00868     // new sc_event; hash <call_id , event>; wait on event;
00869     // later target will cause event to be triggered
00870     void* p_call_id;
00871     // need to do the cast to unsigned long below before casting to pointer
00872     // because on 64 bit m/cs pointers are 64 bits, whereas unsigned is 32
00873     // bits; so casting from unsigned to pointer generates compiler warning;
00874     // unsigend long  matches the size of pointers on 32 bit and 64 bit m/cs
00875     p_call_id = (void *)(unsigned long)call_id;
00876 
00877     sc_event* e = new INVISIBLE_EVENT("uvm_fake_blocking");
00878 
00879     call_id_trans_dict.insert(p_call_id, e);
00880     sc_core::wait(*e);
00881     // we are here when the target framework has informed us via 
00882     // the backplane that the call has finished in it;
00883     // get the return value of get() from the backplane
00884     ptr = val->val; // save pointer
00885     int ret =  BP(b_transport_tlm2_response)(
00886                                       framework_id,
00887                                       connector_id,
00888                                       call_id,
00889                                       &(val->size),
00890                                       val->val
00891                                       );
00892     if(val->val != ptr) delete[] ptr; // delete old value if it was reassigned
00893     delete e;
00894   }
00895 
00896   if (disable == 1) {
00897 
00898       uvm_ml::dpi_task_disabled();
00899   }
00900 }
00901 
00902 // Return -1 for failure
00903 int uvm_ml_tlm_rec::construct_top(const char* top_identifier, const char * instance_name) {
00904  char msg[1024];
00905  try {
00906      sc_module * m = NULL;
00907      // first see if object can be created by uvm factory
00908      if (uvm_factory::is_component_registered(std::string(top_identifier))) {
00909        m = uvm_factory::create_component(std::string(top_identifier), "", 
00910                                          std::string(instance_name));
00911        // assuming nothing can go wrong in creation
00912        //assert(m);
00913        if(m == NULL) {
00914          sprintf(msg,"\ntop identifier is %s; instance name is %s\n", top_identifier, instance_name);
00915          UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: top component could not be created",msg);
00916          return -1;
00917        };
00918      } else {
00919        // not uvm_component registered with factory
00920        // see if it is sc_module
00921        m = QUASI_STATIC_CONSTRUCT_TOP(std::string(top_identifier), std::string(instance_name));
00922 
00923        if (!m) {
00924          // not module, now print error that not registered with factory
00925          char msg[1024];
00926          sprintf(msg, "\nSystemC object name is '%s'", top_identifier); 
00927          cerr << "before thorowing error"<< endl;
00928          SC_REPORT_ERROR(ML_UVM_MISSING_REGISTRATION_, msg);
00929          return -1;
00930        }
00931     }
00932     return uvm_ml_utils::add_quasi_static_tree_node(m);
00933   }
00934   UVM_ML_CATCH_SC_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_1(UVM_ML_QUASI_STATIC_ELABORATION, 0, 0, 0)
00935 }
00936 
00937 
00938 void uvm_ml_tlm_rec::set_debug_mode(int mode) {
00939 }
00940 
00941 void uvm_ml_tlm_rec::set_packing_mode(int mode) {
00942 }
00943 
00944 int uvm_ml_tlm_rec::find_connector_id_by_name(const char * path) { 
00945   try {
00946     unsigned conn_id = uvm_ml_utils::find_socket_id(path);
00947     if (conn_id != 0) {
00948       return conn_id;
00949     }
00950     sc_object* obj = sc_find_object(path);
00951     if (!obj) {
00952       char msg[1024];
00953       sprintf(msg, "\nPort/export is '%s' \n", path);
00954       SC_REPORT_ERROR(ML_UVM_OBJ_NOT_FOUND_, msg);
00955       return 0;
00956     }
00957     uvm_ml_tlm_transrec_base* tr = uvm_ml_utils::get_transrec(obj);
00958     if (!tr) {
00959       char msg[1024];
00960       sprintf(msg, "\nPort/export is '%s' \n", path);
00961       SC_REPORT_ERROR(ML_UVM_NO_TRANS_REC_, msg);
00962       return 0;
00963     }
00964     tr->id_is_valid(true);
00965     uvm_ml_tlm_conn_info* info =
00966       uvm_ml_utils::get_or_create_conn_info(path);
00967     return info->id();
00968   }
00969   UVM_ML_CATCH_SC_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_1(UVM_ML_QUASI_STATIC_ELABORATION, 0, 0, 0)
00970 }
00971 
00972 static std::string map_intf_name(std::string s) {
00973   try {
00974     if (s=="tlm_blocking_put_if") return "tlm_blocking_put";
00975     if (s=="tlm_nonblocking_put_if") return "tlm_nonblocking_put";
00976     if (s=="tlm_put_if") return "tlm_put";
00977   
00978     if (s=="tlm_blocking_get_if") return "tlm_blocking_get";
00979     if (s=="tlm_nonblocking_get_if") return "tlm_nonblocking_get";
00980     if (s=="tlm_get_if") return "tlm_get";
00981 
00982     if (s=="tlm_blocking_peek_if") return "tlm_blocking_peek";
00983     if (s=="tlm_nonblocking_peek_if") return "tlm_nonblocking_peek";
00984     if (s=="tlm_peek_if") return "tlm_peek";
00985 
00986     if (s=="tlm_blocking_get_peek_if") return "tlm_blocking_get_peek";
00987     if (s=="tlm_nonblocking_get_peek_if") return "tlm_nonblocking_get_peek";
00988     if (s=="tlm_get_peek_if") return "tlm_get_peek";
00989 
00990     if (s=="tlm_master_if") return "tlm_master";
00991     if (s=="tlm_slave_if") return "tlm_slave";
00992 
00993     if (s=="tlm_transport_if") return "tlm_blocking_transport";
00994     if (s=="tlm_analysis_if") return "tlm_analysis";
00995     return s;
00996   }
00997   UVM_ML_CATCH_SC_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_1(UVM_ML_QUASI_STATIC_ELABORATION, s, 0, 0)
00998 }
00999 
01000 const char* uvm_ml_tlm_rec::get_connector_intf_name(
01001   unsigned connector_id
01002 ) { 
01003   try {
01004     if(uvm_ml_utils::is_tlm2_connector(connector_id)) {
01005       char* e = (char*)("TLM2");
01006       return e;
01007     }
01008     static std::string sm;
01009     uvm_ml_tlm_transrec_base* tr = get_transrec_base(connector_id);
01010     if (!tr) {
01011       char* e = (char*)("ERROR");
01012       return e;
01013     }
01014     std::string s = tr->get_intf_name();
01015     sm = map_intf_name(s);
01016     char* c = (char*)(sm.c_str());
01017     return c;
01018   }
01019   UVM_ML_CATCH_SC_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_1(UVM_ML_QUASI_STATIC_ELABORATION, 0, 0, 0)
01020 }
01021 
01022 char* uvm_ml_tlm_rec::get_connector_REQ_name(
01023   unsigned connector_id
01024 ) { 
01025   try {
01026     static std::string sm;
01027     if(uvm_ml_utils::is_tlm2_connector(connector_id)) {
01028       char* c = (char*)(sm.c_str());
01029       return c;
01030     }
01031     uvm_ml_tlm_transrec_base* tr = get_transrec_base(connector_id);
01032     if (!tr) {
01033       char* e = (char*)("ERROR");
01034       return e;
01035     }
01036     sm = tr->get_REQ_name();
01037     char* c = (char*)(sm.c_str());
01038     return c;
01039   }
01040   UVM_ML_CATCH_SC_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_1(UVM_ML_QUASI_STATIC_ELABORATION, 0, 0, 0)
01041 }
01042 
01043 char* uvm_ml_tlm_rec::get_connector_RSP_name(
01044   unsigned connector_id
01045 ) { 
01046   try {
01047     static std::string sm;
01048     if(uvm_ml_utils::is_tlm2_connector(connector_id)) {
01049       char* c = (char*)(sm.c_str());
01050       return c;
01051     }
01052     uvm_ml_tlm_transrec_base* tr = get_transrec_base(connector_id);
01053     if (!tr) {
01054       char* e = (char*)("ERROR");
01055       return e;
01056     }
01057     sm = tr->get_RSP_name();
01058     char* c = (char*)(sm.c_str());
01059     return c;
01060   }
01061   UVM_ML_CATCH_SC_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_1(UVM_ML_QUASI_STATIC_ELABORATION, 0, 0, 0)
01062 }
01063 
01064 unsigned uvm_ml_tlm_rec::is_export_connector(
01065   unsigned connector_id
01066 ) { 
01067   try {
01068     if(uvm_ml_utils::is_tlm2_connector(connector_id)) {
01069       ml_tlm2_connector_base* conn = uvm_ml_utils::get_ml_tlm2_connector_base(connector_id);
01070       return conn->is_target;
01071     }
01072     uvm_ml_tlm_conn_info* info = 
01073       uvm_ml_utils::get_conn_info(connector_id);
01074     if (!info) {
01075       SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_CONNECTOR_ID_NOT_FOUND_,"");
01076       return 0;
01077     }
01078     sc_object* obj = info->object();
01079     uvm_ml_tlm_transrec_base* tr = uvm_ml_utils::get_transrec(obj);
01080     if (!tr) {
01081       char msg[1024];
01082       sprintf(msg, "\nPort/export is '%s' \n", obj->name());
01083       SC_REPORT_ERROR(ML_UVM_NO_TRANS_REC_, msg);
01084       return 0;
01085     }
01086     if (tr->is_transmitter()) {
01087       return 0;
01088     }
01089     return 1;
01090   }
01091   UVM_ML_CATCH_SC_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_1(UVM_ML_QUASI_STATIC_ELABORATION, 0, 0, 0)
01092 }
01093 
01094 int uvm_ml_tlm_rec::set_multiport(char* port_name) {
01095   try {
01096     // multiport, error out
01097     char msg[1024];
01098     sprintf(msg, "\nPort is '%s' \n", port_name);
01099     SC_REPORT_ERROR(ML_UVM_NO_MULTIPORT_, msg);
01100     return 0;
01101   }
01102   UVM_ML_CATCH_SC_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_1(UVM_ML_QUASI_STATIC_ELABORATION, 0, 0, 0)
01103 }
01104 
01105 uvm_ml_tlm_transrec_base* uvm_ml_tlm_rec::get_transrec_base(
01106   unsigned connector_id
01107 ) {
01108   try {
01109     uvm_ml_tlm_conn_info* info = uvm_ml_utils::get_conn_info(connector_id);
01110     sc_object* obj = info->object();
01111     uvm_ml_tlm_transrec_base* tr = uvm_ml_utils::get_transrec(obj);
01112     if (!tr) {
01113       // should this really be an assert that tr exists? Should not have come 
01114       // this far otherwise
01115       char msg[1024];
01116       sprintf(msg, "\nPort/export is '%s' \n", obj->name());
01117       SC_REPORT_ERROR(ML_UVM_NO_TRANS_REC_, msg);
01118     }
01119     return tr;
01120   }
01121   UVM_ML_CATCH_SC_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_1(UVM_ML_QUASI_STATIC_ELABORATION, 0, 0, 0)
01122 }
01123 
01124 uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base* uvm_ml_tlm_rec::get_receiver_base(
01125   unsigned connector_id
01126 ) {
01127   try {
01128     uvm_ml_tlm_transrec_base* tr = get_transrec_base(connector_id);
01129     if (!tr) return 0;
01130     if (tr->is_transmitter()) {
01131       SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_RECEIVER_NOT_VALID_,"");
01132       return 0;
01133     }
01134     uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base* rec = DCAST<uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base*>(tr);
01135     if (!rec) {
01136       SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_RECEIVER_NOT_VALID_,"");
01137       return 0;
01138     }
01139     return rec;
01140   }
01141   UVM_ML_CATCH_SC_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_1(UVM_ML_QUASI_STATIC_ELABORATION, 0, 0, 0)
01142 }
01143 
01144 uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_base* uvm_ml_tlm_rec::get_transmitter_base(
01145   unsigned connector_id
01146 ) {
01147   try {
01148     // never called
01149     uvm_ml_tlm_transrec_base* tr = get_transrec_base(connector_id);
01150     if (!tr) return 0;
01151     if (!(tr->is_transmitter())) {
01152       SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_TRANSMITTER_NOT_VALID_,"");
01153       return 0;
01154     }
01155     uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_base* trans = DCAST<uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_base*>(tr);
01156     if (!trans) {
01157       SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_TRANSMITTER_NOT_VALID_,"");
01158       return 0;
01159     }
01160     return trans;
01161   }
01162   UVM_ML_CATCH_SC_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_1(UVM_ML_QUASI_STATIC_ELABORATION, 0, 0, 0)
01163 }
01164 
01165 // put takes part in disable protocol as it is blocking,
01166 // so exception catching is more specialized
01167 int uvm_ml_tlm_rec::put(
01168     unsigned connector_id, 
01169     unsigned stream_size, 
01170     uvm_ml_stream_t stream, 
01171   uvm_ml_time_unit * time_unit, 
01172   double           * time_value
01173 ) {
01174     ENTER_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT2();
01175   int ret = 0;
01176   EXCEPTION_HANDLER_STORAGE();
01177   char msg[1024];
01178   sprintf(msg, "\nTLM function is put");
01179   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base* rec = 0;
01180   try {
01181       STORE_OLD_EXCEPTION_HANDLER();
01182     rec = get_receiver_base(connector_id);
01183     if (!rec) {
01184         RESTORE_OLD_EXCEPTION_HANDLER();
01185         EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01186       return 0;
01187     }
01188     ret = rec->put_bitstream(stream_size, stream);
01189     RESTORE_OLD_EXCEPTION_HANDLER();
01190     EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01191     return ret;
01192   }
01193   //CATCH_EXCEPTION_POP(msg);
01194   SC_KILL_CATCHER()
01195   catch( const sc_report& ex ) {
01196       RESTORE_OLD_EXCEPTION_HANDLER();
01197       EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01198       UVM_ML_SC_PRINT_REPORT(ex);
01199     report_tlm1_error(rec);
01200 
01201     return ret;
01202 
01203   }
01204   catch( const ::std::exception& x )
01205   {
01206       RESTORE_OLD_EXCEPTION_HANDLER();
01207       EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01208       UVM_ML_REPORT_COMPOSE_MESSAGE(x);
01209       report_tlm1_error(rec);
01210       return ret;
01211   }
01212   catch( const char* s )
01213   {
01214       RESTORE_OLD_EXCEPTION_HANDLER();
01215       EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01216     cout << "\n" << s << "\n";
01217     report_tlm1_error(rec);
01218     return ret;
01219   }
01220   EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01221   return ret;
01222 
01223 }
01224 
01225 void put_bitstream_request_helper(
01226   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base* rec,
01227   unsigned call_id,
01228   unsigned callback_adapter_id,
01229   uvm_ml_packed_obj* mlupo_stream
01230 ) {
01231   try {
01232     // call blocking put()
01233     rec->put_bitstream(mlupo_stream->size, mlupo_stream->val);
01234     // when put() returns, callback into source adapter
01235     // to inform that call has ended
01236     uvm_ml_tlm_trans::notify_end_blocking(callback_adapter_id, call_id);
01237     //delete mlupo_stream;
01238     uvm_ml_utils::release_mlupo_to_pool(mlupo_stream);
01239   }
01240   CATCH_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_IN_RECEIVER_3
01241 }
01242 
01243 int uvm_ml_tlm_rec::request_put(
01244   unsigned connector_id, 
01245   unsigned call_id, 
01246   unsigned callback_adapter_id, 
01247   unsigned stream_size, 
01248   uvm_ml_stream_t stream, 
01249   uvm_ml_time_unit time_unit, 
01250   double           time_value
01251 ) { 
01252   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base* rec = 0;
01253   try {
01254       ENTER_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01255       rec = get_receiver_base(connector_id);
01256       if (!rec) { 
01257           EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01258           return 0; 
01259       }
01260     // this form is called when we're doing fake blocking; so cannot
01261     // call put() directly and block;
01262     // instead, spawn a helper thread that will do the blocking call
01263     // and return
01264     sc_spawn_options op;
01265 
01266     MARK_THREAD_INVISIBLE(op);
01267     char name[1024];
01268     sprintf(name, "put_bitstream_request_helper_%d", call_id);
01269     
01270     // copy the stream into a mlupo. This is necessary because it is 
01271     // likely that in backplane, they use the same stream for 
01272     // multiple calls - so for back to back calls the arguments will get
01273     // overwritten until we make a copy here;
01274     // the helper will delete the mlupo we allocate here when it is done
01275 
01276     //MLUPO* mlupo_stream = new MLUPO;
01277     MLUPO* mlupo_stream = uvm_ml_utils::get_mlupo_from_pool();
01278     uvm_ml_utils::fill_mlupo(*mlupo_stream,stream_size,stream);
01279   
01280     sc_core::sc_spawn(sc_bind(&put_bitstream_request_helper,
01281                               rec,
01282                               call_id,
01283                               callback_adapter_id,
01284                               mlupo_stream
01285                              ),
01286                         name, 
01287                         &op
01288                      );
01289     EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT2();
01290     return 0;
01291   }
01292   CATCH_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_IN_RECEIVER_2_INT
01293   return 0;
01294 }
01295 
01296 int uvm_ml_tlm_rec::nb_put(
01297   unsigned connector_id, 
01298   unsigned stream_size , 
01299   uvm_ml_stream_t stream, 
01300   uvm_ml_time_unit time_unit, 
01301   double           time_value
01302 ) { 
01303   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base* rec = 0;
01304   try {
01305       ENTER_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01306       rec = get_receiver_base(connector_id);
01307     if (!rec) { 
01308         EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01309       return 0; 
01310     }
01311     int i = rec->try_put_bitstream(stream_size,stream);
01312     EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT2();
01313     return i;
01314   }
01315   CATCH_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_IN_RECEIVER_1
01316 }
01317 
01318 int uvm_ml_tlm_rec::can_put(
01319   unsigned connector_id, 
01320   uvm_ml_time_unit time_unit, 
01321   double           time_value
01322 ) { 
01323   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base* rec = 0;
01324   try {
01325       ENTER_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01326     rec = get_receiver_base(connector_id);
01327     if (!rec) { 
01328         EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01329       return 0; 
01330     }
01331     int i = rec->can_put();
01332     EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01333     return i;
01334   }
01335   CATCH_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_IN_RECEIVER_1
01336 }
01337 
01338 // get_bitstream takes part in disable protocol as it is blocking,
01339 // so exception catching is more specialized
01340 int uvm_ml_tlm_rec::get(
01341   unsigned connector_id, 
01342   unsigned* stream_size_ptr,
01343   uvm_ml_stream_t stream, 
01344   uvm_ml_time_unit * time_unit, 
01345   double           * time_value
01346 ) { 
01347     ENTER_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT2();
01348   int ret = 0;
01349   EXCEPTION_HANDLER_STORAGE();
01350   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base* rec = 0;
01351   try {
01352       STORE_OLD_EXCEPTION_HANDLER();
01353     rec = get_receiver_base(connector_id);
01354     if (!rec) { 
01355         RESTORE_OLD_EXCEPTION_HANDLER();
01356         EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01357       return 0; 
01358     }
01359     ret = rec->get_bitstream(stream_size_ptr, stream);
01360     RESTORE_OLD_EXCEPTION_HANDLER();
01361     EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01362     return ret;
01363   }
01364   SC_KILL_CATCHER()
01365   catch( const sc_report& ex ) {
01366       RESTORE_OLD_EXCEPTION_HANDLER();
01367       EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01368       UVM_ML_SC_PRINT_REPORT(ex);
01369     report_tlm1_error(rec);
01370     return ret;
01371   }
01372   catch( const ::std::exception& x )
01373   {
01374       RESTORE_OLD_EXCEPTION_HANDLER();
01375       EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01376       UVM_ML_REPORT_COMPOSE_MESSAGE(x);
01377       
01378     report_tlm1_error(rec);
01379     return ret;
01380   }
01381   catch( const char* s )
01382   {
01383       RESTORE_OLD_EXCEPTION_HANDLER();
01384       EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01385     cout << "\n" << s << "\n";
01386     report_tlm1_error(rec);
01387     return ret;
01388   }
01389   EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01390   return ret;
01391 
01392 }
01393 
01394 void get_bitstream_request_helper(
01395   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base* rec,
01396   unsigned call_id,
01397   unsigned callback_adapter_id
01398 ) {
01399   try {
01400     // call blocking get()
01401     MLUPO* retval = uvm_ml_utils::get_mlupo_from_pool();
01402     uvm_ml_utils::allocate_mlupo(retval);
01403     rec->get_bitstream(&(retval->size), retval->val);
01404     // when get() returns, first hash return value with call id be 
01405     // retrieved later thru get_requested_bitstream()
01406     void* p_call_id;
01407       // need to do the cast to unsigned long below before casting to pointer
01408       // because on 64 bit m/cs pointers are 64 bits, whereas unsigned is 32
01409       // bits; so casting from unsigned to pointer generates compiler warning;
01410       // unsigend long  matches the size of pointers on 32 bit and 64 bit m/cs
01411     p_call_id = (void *)(unsigned long)call_id;
01412     call_id_rec_dict.insert(p_call_id, retval);
01413     // callback into source adapter
01414     // to inform that call has ended
01415     uvm_ml_tlm_trans::notify_end_blocking(callback_adapter_id, call_id);
01416   }
01417   CATCH_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_IN_RECEIVER_3
01418 }
01419 
01420 int uvm_ml_tlm_rec::request_get(
01421   unsigned connector_id, 
01422   unsigned call_id,
01423   unsigned callback_adapter_id, 
01424   uvm_ml_time_unit time_unit, 
01425   double           time_value
01426 ) { 
01427   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base* rec = 0;
01428   try {
01429       ENTER_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01430     rec = get_receiver_base(connector_id);
01431     if (!rec) {
01432         EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01433       return 0 ;
01434     }
01435     // this form is called when we're doing fake blocking; so cannot
01436     // call get() directly and block;
01437     // instead, spawn a helper thread that will do the blocking call
01438     // and return
01439     sc_spawn_options op;
01440     char name[1024];
01441     sprintf(name, "get_bitstream_request_helper_%d", call_id);
01442     MARK_THREAD_INVISIBLE(op);
01443     sc_core::sc_spawn(sc_bind(&get_bitstream_request_helper,
01444                               rec,
01445                               call_id,
01446                               callback_adapter_id
01447                              ),
01448                       name, 
01449                       &op
01450                      );
01451     EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01452     return 0;
01453   }
01454   CATCH_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_IN_RECEIVER_2_INT
01455 
01456 
01457   return 0;
01458 }
01459 
01460 unsigned uvm_ml_tlm_rec::get_requested(
01461     unsigned connector_id, 
01462     unsigned call_id , 
01463     uvm_ml_stream_t stream
01464 ) {
01465   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base* rec = 0;
01466   try {
01467       ENTER_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT2();
01468     rec = get_receiver_base(connector_id);
01469     // need to do the cast to unsigned long below before casting to pointer
01470     // because on 64 bit m/cs pointers are 64 bits, whereas unsigned is 32
01471     // bits; so casting from unsigned to pointer generates compiler warning;
01472     // unsigend long  matches the size of pointers on 32 bit and 64 bit m/cs
01473     void* p_call_id = (void*)(unsigned long)call_id;
01474     uvm_ml_packed_obj* retval = call_id_rec_dict[p_call_id];
01475     unsigned size =  uvm_ml_utils::copy_from_mlupo(*retval, stream);
01476 
01477     uvm_ml_utils::release_mlupo_to_pool(retval);
01478     EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01479     return size;
01480   }
01481   CATCH_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_IN_RECEIVER_1
01482 }

01581 
01582 void peek_bitstream_request_helper(
01583   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base* rec,
01584   unsigned call_id,
01585   unsigned callback_adapter_id
01586 ) {
01587   try {
01588     MLUPO* retval = uvm_ml_utils::get_mlupo_from_pool();
01589     uvm_ml_utils::allocate_mlupo(retval);
01590     // call blocking get()
01591     rec->peek_bitstream(&(retval->size), retval->val);
01592     // when get() returns, first hash return value with call id be 
01593     // retrieved later thru get_requested_bitstream()
01594     void* p_call_id;
01595     // need to do the cast to unsigned long below before casting to pointer
01596     // because on 64 bit m/cs pointers are 64 bits, whereas unsigned is 32
01597     // bits; so casting from unsigned to pointer generates compiler warning;
01598     // unsigend long  matches the size of pointers on 32 bit and 64 bit m/cs
01599     p_call_id = (void*)(unsigned long)call_id;
01600     call_id_rec_dict.insert(p_call_id, retval);
01601     // callback into source adapter
01602     // to inform that call has ended
01603     uvm_ml_tlm_trans::notify_end_blocking(callback_adapter_id, call_id);
01604   }
01605   CATCH_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_IN_RECEIVER_3
01606 }

01714 // transport_bitstream takes part in disable protocol as it is blocking,
01715 // so exception catching is more specialized
01716 
01717 int uvm_ml_tlm_rec::transport(
01718     unsigned connector_id, 
01719     unsigned req_stream_size, 
01720     uvm_ml_stream_t req_stream,
01721     unsigned* rsp_stream_size, 
01722     uvm_ml_stream_t rsp_stream, 
01723   uvm_ml_time_unit * time_unit, 
01724   double           * time_value
01725 ) {
01726     ENTER_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT2();
01727   int ret = 0;
01728   EXCEPTION_HANDLER_STORAGE();
01729   char msg[1024];
01730   sprintf(msg, "\nTLM function is transport");
01731   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base* rec = 0;
01732 
01733   try {
01734       STORE_OLD_EXCEPTION_HANDLER();
01735     rec = get_receiver_base(connector_id);
01736     if (!rec) { 
01737         RESTORE_OLD_EXCEPTION_HANDLER();
01738         EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01739       return 0; 
01740     }
01741     ret = rec->transport_bitstream(
01742       req_stream_size, 
01743       req_stream,
01744       rsp_stream_size, 
01745       rsp_stream
01746     );
01747     RESTORE_OLD_EXCEPTION_HANDLER();
01748     EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01749     return ret;
01750   } 
01751   SC_KILL_CATCHER()
01752   catch( const sc_report& ex ) {
01753       RESTORE_OLD_EXCEPTION_HANDLER();
01754       EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01755       UVM_ML_SC_PRINT_REPORT(ex);
01756     report_tlm1_error(rec);
01757 
01758     return ret;
01759   }
01760   catch( const ::std::exception& x )
01761   {
01762       RESTORE_OLD_EXCEPTION_HANDLER();
01763       EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01764       UVM_ML_REPORT_COMPOSE_MESSAGE(x);
01765     report_tlm1_error(rec);
01766 
01767     return ret;
01768   }
01769   catch( const char* s )
01770   {
01771       RESTORE_OLD_EXCEPTION_HANDLER();
01772       EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01773     cout << "\n" << s << "\n";
01774     report_tlm1_error(rec);
01775     //sc_get_curr_simcontext()->set_error();
01776     return ret;
01777   }
01778   EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01779   return ret;
01780 }
01781 
01782 void transport_bitstream_request_helper(
01783   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base* rec,
01784   unsigned call_id,
01785   unsigned callback_adapter_id,
01786   MLUPO* mlupo_req_stream 
01787 ) {
01788   try {
01789     MLUPO* rspval = uvm_ml_utils::get_mlupo_from_pool();
01790     uvm_ml_utils::allocate_mlupo(rspval);
01791     // call blocking transport()
01792     rec->transport_bitstream(
01793       mlupo_req_stream->size,
01794       mlupo_req_stream->val,
01795       &(rspval->size), 
01796       rspval->val
01797     );
01798     // when transport() returns, first hash return value with call id to be 
01799     // retrieved later thru transport_response_bitstream()
01800     void* p_call_id;
01801     // need to do the cast to unsigned long below before casting to pointer
01802     // because on 64 bit m/cs pointers are 64 bits, whereas unsigned is 32
01803     // bits; so casting from unsigned to pointer generates compiler warning;
01804     // unsigend long  matches the size of pointers on 32 bit and 64 bit m/cs
01805     p_call_id = (void*)(unsigned long)call_id;
01806     call_id_rec_dict.insert(p_call_id, rspval);
01807     // callback into source adapter
01808     // to inform that call has ended
01809     uvm_ml_tlm_trans::notify_end_blocking(callback_adapter_id, call_id);
01810     //delete mlupo_req_stream;
01811     uvm_ml_utils::release_mlupo_to_pool(mlupo_req_stream);
01812   }
01813   CATCH_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_IN_RECEIVER_3
01814 }
01815 
01816 int uvm_ml_tlm_rec::request_transport(
01817     unsigned connector_id, 
01818     unsigned call_id, 
01819     unsigned callback_adapter_id, 
01820     unsigned req_stream_size, 
01821     uvm_ml_stream_t req_stream,
01822     unsigned* rsp_stream_size, 
01823     uvm_ml_stream_t rsp_stream, 
01824   uvm_ml_time_unit time_unit, 
01825   double           time_value
01826 )  {
01827   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base* rec = 0;
01828   try {
01829       ENTER_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01830     rec = get_receiver_base(connector_id);
01831     if (!rec) {
01832         EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01833       return 0 ;
01834     }
01835     // this form is called when we're doing fake blocking; so cannot
01836     // call transport() directly and block;
01837     // instead, spawn a helper thread that will do the blocking call
01838     // and return
01839     sc_spawn_options op;
01840     char name[1024];
01841     sprintf(name, "transport_bitstream_request_helper_%d", call_id);
01842     MARK_THREAD_INVISIBLE(op);
01843 
01844     // copy the req_stream into a mlupo. This is necessary because it is 
01845     // likely that in backplane, they use the same stream for 
01846     // multiple calls - so for back to back calls the arguments will get
01847     // overwritten until we make a copy here;
01848     // the helper will delete the mlupo we allocate here when it is done
01849   
01850     //MLUPO* mlupo_req_stream = new MLUPO;
01851     MLUPO* mlupo_req_stream = uvm_ml_utils::get_mlupo_from_pool();
01852     uvm_ml_utils::fill_mlupo(*mlupo_req_stream,req_stream_size,req_stream);
01853 
01854     sc_core::sc_spawn(sc_bind(&transport_bitstream_request_helper,
01855                               rec,
01856                               call_id,
01857                               callback_adapter_id,
01858                               mlupo_req_stream
01859                              ),
01860                       name, 
01861                       &op
01862                      );
01863     EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01864   }
01865   CATCH_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_IN_RECEIVER_2_INT
01866 
01867   return 0;
01868 }
01869 
01870 unsigned uvm_ml_tlm_rec::transport_response(
01871   unsigned            connector_id,
01872   unsigned            call_id,
01873   uvm_ml_stream_t rsp_stream 
01874 ) {
01875   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base* rec = get_receiver_base(connector_id);
01876   try {
01877       ENTER_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT2();
01878     // need to do the cast to unsigned long below before casting to pointer
01879     // because on 64 bit m/cs pointers are 64 bits, whereas unsigned is 32
01880     // bits; so casting from unsigned to pointer generates compiler warning;
01881     // unsigend long  matches the size of pointers on 32 bit and 64 bit m/cs
01882     void* p_call_id = (void*)(unsigned long)call_id;
01883     uvm_ml_packed_obj* rspval = call_id_rec_dict[p_call_id];
01884     unsigned size =  uvm_ml_utils::copy_from_mlupo(*rspval, rsp_stream);
01885     //delete rspval;
01886     uvm_ml_utils::release_mlupo_to_pool(rspval);
01887     EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01888     return size;
01889   }
01890   CATCH_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_IN_RECEIVER_1
01891 }
01892 
01893 int uvm_ml_tlm_rec::nb_transport(
01894     unsigned connector_id, 
01895     unsigned req_stream_size, 
01896     uvm_ml_stream_t req_stream,
01897     unsigned* rsp_stream_size, 
01898     uvm_ml_stream_t rsp_stream, 
01899   uvm_ml_time_unit time_unit, 
01900   double           time_value
01901 ) {
01902     cerr << "Unimplemented: uvm_ml_tlm_rec::nb_transport_bitstream, "
01903          << "should not be here!!!!!" << endl;
01904   return 0;
01905 }
01906 
01907 void uvm_ml_tlm_rec::write(
01908   unsigned connector_id, 
01909   unsigned stream_size , 
01910   uvm_ml_stream_t stream, 
01911   uvm_ml_time_unit time_unit, 
01912   double           time_value
01913 ) { 
01914   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base* rec = 0;
01915   try {
01916       ENTER_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01917     rec = get_receiver_base(connector_id);
01918     if (!rec) { 
01919         EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01920       return; 
01921     }
01922     rec->write_bitstream(stream_size,stream);
01923     EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01924   }
01925   CATCH_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_IN_RECEIVER_2_VOID
01926 }
01927 
01928 void uvm_ml_tlm_rec::notify_end_blocking(
01929   unsigned call_id, 
01930   uvm_ml_time_unit time_unit, 
01931   double           time_value
01932 ) {
01933   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base* rec = 0;
01934   try {
01935       ENTER_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT3();
01936     // need to do the cast to unsigned long below before casting to pointer
01937     // because on 64 bit m/cs pointers are 64 bits, whereas unsigned is 32
01938     // bits; so casting from unsigned to pointer generates compiler warning;
01939     // unsigend long  matches the size of pointers on 32 bit and 64 bit m/cs
01940     void* p_call_id = (void*)(unsigned long)call_id;
01941     sc_event* e = call_id_trans_dict[p_call_id];
01942     if (!e) {
01943         EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT5();
01944         SC_REPORT_ERROR(ML_UVM_UNKNOWN_CALL_ID_, 0);
01945     }
01946     e->notify(); // will cause calling SC thread to get scheduled
01947     EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT4();
01948   }
01949   CATCH_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_IN_RECEIVER_2_VOID
01950 }
01951 
01953 
01954 // TLM2
01955 
01956 int uvm_ml_tlm_rec::tlm2_b_transport(
01957     unsigned              connector_id, 
01958     unsigned *            stream_size,
01959     uvm_ml_stream_t * stream,
01960     uvm_ml_time_unit *    delay_unit,
01961     double *              delay_value,
01962     uvm_ml_time_unit      time_unit, 
01963     double                time_value
01964 ) {
01965   ml_tlm2_connector_base* conn = 0;
01966 
01967   try {
01968       ENTER_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01969     conn = uvm_ml_utils::get_ml_tlm2_connector_base(connector_id);
01970     if (!conn) { 
01971       EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01972       return 1; // TBD FIXME
01973     }
01974     //assert(conn->is_target);
01975     if(!(conn->is_target)) {
01976       EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
01977       UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: tlm2_b_transport connector is not target","");
01978       return 1;
01979     };
01980     ml_tlm2_target_connector_base *target_conn = dynamic_cast<ml_tlm2_target_connector_base *>(conn);
01981     
01982     // Create MLUPO from stream
01983     uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo(); 
01984     uvm_ml_utils::fill_mlupo(vt,*stream_size,*stream);
01985     
01986     target_conn->b_transport(vt, (sc_time_unit *) delay_unit, delay_value, (sc_time_unit)time_unit, time_value);
01987     // Check that the incoming stream is big enough to store the 
01988     // transaction on the return path
01989     if (vt.size > *stream_size) 
01990       *stream = new unsigned[vt.size/UVM_ML_BLOCK_SIZE];
01991     // it is the caller's responsibility to deallocate both streams
01992     *stream_size = uvm_ml_utils::copy_from_mlupo(vt, *stream);    
01993 
01994 
01995     EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT2();
01996     return 0;
01997   }
01998   CATCH_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_IN_CONNECTOR_4
01999 }
02000 
02001 void uvm_ml_tlm_rec::tlm2_transport_request_helper(
02002   ml_tlm2_target_connector_base* conn,
02003   unsigned                       call_id,
02004   unsigned                       callback_adapter_id,
02005   MLUPO                        * mlupo_req_stream,
02006   sc_time_unit                   delay_unit, 
02007   double                         delay_value,
02008   sc_time_unit                   time_unit, 
02009   double                         time_value
02010 ) {
02011   try {
02012     conn->b_transport(
02013       *mlupo_req_stream,
02014       &delay_unit,
02015       &delay_value,
02016       time_unit,
02017       time_value
02018     );
02019     // need to do the cast to unsigned long below before casting to pointer
02020     // because on 64 bit m/cs pointers are 64 bits, whereas unsigned is 32
02021     // bits; so casting from unsigned to pointer generates compiler warning;
02022     // unsigend long  matches the size of pointers on 32 bit and 64 bit m/cs
02023     void* p_call_id = (void*)(unsigned long)call_id;
02024     call_id_rec_dict.insert(p_call_id, mlupo_req_stream);
02025     call_id_delay_unit_dict[call_id] = delay_unit;
02026     call_id_delay_value_dict[call_id] = delay_value;
02027     // callback into source adapter to inform that call has ended
02028     uvm_ml_tlm_trans::notify_end_blocking(callback_adapter_id, call_id);
02029   }
02030   CATCH_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_IN_CONNECTOR_3
02031 }
02032 
02033 int uvm_ml_tlm_rec::tlm2_b_transport_request(
02034     unsigned            connector_id, 
02035     unsigned            call_id,
02036     unsigned            callback_adapter_id,
02037     unsigned            stream_size,
02038     uvm_ml_stream_t stream,
02039     uvm_ml_time_unit   delay_unit,
02040     double              delay_value,
02041     uvm_ml_time_unit    time_unit, 
02042     double              time_value
02043 ) {
02044   ml_tlm2_target_connector_base* conn = 0;
02045   try {
02046       ENTER_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
02047     conn = dynamic_cast<ml_tlm2_target_connector_base *>(uvm_ml_utils::get_ml_tlm2_connector_base(connector_id));
02048     if (!conn) {
02049         EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
02050         return 1; // TBD FIXME - 1 indicates disabled threads not an internal error
02051     }
02052     ml_tlm2_target_connector_base *target_conn = dynamic_cast<ml_tlm2_target_connector_base *>(conn);
02053 
02054     // this form is called when we're doing fake blocking; so cannot
02055     // call transport() directly and block;
02056     // instead, spawn a helper thread that will do the blocking call
02057     // and return
02058     sc_spawn_options op;
02059     char name[1024];
02060     sprintf(name, "tlm2_transport_request_helper_%d", call_id);
02061     MARK_THREAD_INVISIBLE(op);
02062 
02063     // copy the req_stream into a mlupo. This is necessary because it is 
02064     // likely that in backplane, they use the same stream for 
02065     // multiple calls - so for back to back calls the arguments will get
02066     // overwritten unless we make a copy here;
02067     // the helper will delete the mlupo we allocate here when it is done
02068   
02069     MLUPO* mlupo_req_stream = uvm_ml_utils::get_mlupo_from_pool();
02070     uvm_ml_utils::fill_mlupo(*mlupo_req_stream,stream_size,stream);
02071 
02072     sc_core::sc_spawn(sc_bind(&tlm2_transport_request_helper,
02073                               conn,
02074                               call_id,
02075                               callback_adapter_id,
02076                               mlupo_req_stream,
02077                               (sc_time_unit)delay_unit,
02078                               delay_value,
02079                               (sc_time_unit)time_unit,
02080                               time_value
02081                              ),
02082                       name, 
02083                       &op
02084                      );
02085     EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT2();
02086     return 0; // TBD FIXME - support disabling of the threads
02087   }
02088   CATCH_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_IN_CONNECTOR_4
02089 }
02090 
02091 int uvm_ml_tlm_rec::tlm2_b_transport_response(
02092     unsigned              connector_id, 
02093     unsigned              call_id,
02094     unsigned *            stream_size,
02095     uvm_ml_stream_t * stream
02096 ) {

02101     // need to do the cast to unsigned long below before casting to pointer
02102     // because on 64 bit m/cs pointers are 64 bits, whereas unsigned is 32
02103     // bits; so casting from unsigned to pointer generates compiler warning;
02104     // unsigend long matches the size of pointers on 32 bit and 64 bit m/cs

02106     uvm_ml_packed_obj* rspval = call_id_rec_dict[p_call_id];
02107     *stream_size =  uvm_ml_utils::copy_from_mlupo(*rspval, *stream);
02108     uvm_ml_utils::release_mlupo_to_pool(rspval);
02109     EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
02110     return 0;
02111   }

02115 uvm_ml_tlm_sync_enum uvm_ml_tlm_rec::tlm2_nb_transport_fw(
02116     unsigned              connector_id,
02117     unsigned *            stream_size,
02118     uvm_ml_stream_t * stream,
02119     uvm_ml_tlm_phase *   phase,
02120     unsigned int          transaction_id,
02121     uvm_ml_time_unit *   delay_unit,
02122     double *              delay_value,
02123     uvm_ml_time_unit      time_unit, 
02124     double                time_value
02125 ) {
02126   ml_tlm2_connector_base* conn = 0;
02127   tlm_sync_enum ret;
02128 
02129   try {
02130       ENTER_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
02131     conn = uvm_ml_utils::get_ml_tlm2_connector_base(connector_id);
02132     if (!conn) { 
02133         EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
02134       return UVM_ML_TLM2_COMPLETED; // return error code
02135     }
02136     //assert(conn->is_target);
02137     if(!(conn->is_target)) {
02138       EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
02139       UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: tlm2_nb_transport_fw connector is not target","");
02140       return UVM_ML_TLM2_COMPLETED; // return error code
02141     };
02142     ml_tlm2_target_connector_base *target_conn = dynamic_cast<ml_tlm2_target_connector_base *>(conn);
02143     
02144     // Create MLUPO from stream
02145     uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo(); 
02146     uvm_ml_utils::fill_mlupo(vt,*stream_size,*stream);
02147     
02148     ret = target_conn->nb_transport_fw(vt, (tlm_phase_enum *) phase, transaction_id, (sc_time_unit *) delay_unit, delay_value, (sc_time_unit)time_unit, time_value);
02149     // Check that the incoming stream is big enough to store the 
02150     // transaction on the return path
02151     if (vt.size > *stream_size) 
02152       *stream = new unsigned[vt.size/UVM_ML_BLOCK_SIZE];
02153     // it is the caller's responsibility to deallocate both streams
02154     *stream_size = uvm_ml_utils::copy_from_mlupo(vt, *stream);    
02155     EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
02156     return (uvm_ml_tlm_sync_enum) ret;
02157   }
02158   CATCH_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_IN_CONNECTOR_1
02159 }

02193

02195     // Check that the incoming stream is big enough to store the

02201     
02202     EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
02203     return (uvm_ml_tlm_sync_enum) ret;
02204   }

02260 
02261 
02262 int uvm_ml_tlm_rec::create_child_junction_node(const char * component_type_name,
02263                                                const char * instance_name,
02264                                                const char * parent_full_name,
02265                                                int          parent_framework_id,
02266                                                int          parent_junction_node_id) {
02267 
02268     // The parent proxy with the given parent_full_name might already exist if the parent junction node
02269     // instantiates multiple SystemC child components. Hence. first thing, check if it exists:
02270     string parentFullName = string(parent_full_name);
02271     parent_component_proxy * proxy = uvm_ml_utils::find_parent_proxy_by_id(parent_junction_node_id);
02272     if (proxy == NULL)
02273         proxy = parent_component_proxy::create(parentFullName, parent_framework_id, parent_junction_node_id);
02274     return proxy->add_node(component_type_name, instance_name);
02275 }
02276 
02277 static void * backplane_handle = NULL;
02278 
02279 static const char* const backplane_get_provided_tray = "bp_get_provided_tray";
02280 
02281 
02282 static void backplane_open()
02283 {
02284     // The backplane library may be compiled in or preloaded
02285     // So, start with the 'global' namespace
02286     backplane_handle  = dlopen(0, RTLD_LAZY);
02287     
02288     if ( backplane_handle != 0) {
02289         if ( dlsym(backplane_handle, backplane_get_provided_tray) != 0) {
02290             return;
02291         }
02292     }
02293 
02294     const char* const backplane_lib_name = "libml_uvm.so";
02295 
02296     char * lib_location = getenv("UVM_ML_OVERRIDE");
02297 
02298     if (lib_location == NULL) { 
02299         lib_location = getenv("UNILANG_OVERRIDE");
02300     }
02301 
02302     if (lib_location) {
02303         backplane_handle  = dlopen(((string)lib_location + "/"+backplane_lib_name).c_str(), RTLD_LAZY | RTLD_GLOBAL);
02304     } else {
02305         backplane_handle  = dlopen(backplane_lib_name, RTLD_LAZY | RTLD_GLOBAL);
02306     }
02307 
02308     if (backplane_handle == NULL) {
02309         string err_str = (char *) dlerror();
02310 
02311         // FIXME - use proper error messaging and proper per-simulator graceful shutdown mechanism here
02312 
02313         ::std::cout << "Failed to open the backplane library " << backplane_lib_name << " for the following reason: " << err_str << ::std::endl;
02314         exit(0);
02315     }
02316 
02317 }
02318 
02319 
02320 } // namespace uvm_ml
02322 
02323 EXTERN_DISABLE_SC_START;
02324 
02325 // return 0 for error
02326 unsigned uvm_ml_utils::initialize_adapter()
02327 {
02328     backplane_open();
02329 
02330     //assert(backplane_handle != NULL);
02331     if(backplane_handle == NULL) {
02332       UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: backplane not initialized","");
02333       return 0; // return error code
02334     };
02335 
02336     bp_api_struct* (*bp_get_provided_tray_ptr)() = (bp_api_struct* (*)())dlsym(backplane_handle, backplane_get_provided_tray);
02337     bpProvidedAPI = (bp_get_provided_tray_ptr)();
02338     //assert(bpProvidedAPI != NULL);
02339     if(bpProvidedAPI == NULL) {
02340       UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: backplane provided API not available","");
02341       return 0; // return error code
02342     };
02343     char *frmw_ids[3] = {(char*)"UVMSC", (char*)"SC",(char*)""};
02344     DISABLE_SC_START();
02345 
02346     uvm_ml_phase::Initialize(bpProvidedAPI);        // Initialize phasing
02347     uvm_ml_config_rsrc::Initialize(bpProvidedAPI);  // Initialize config/rsrc
02348 
02349     return BP(register_framework)((char*)"SystemC",frmw_ids, uvm_ml_sc_get_required_api());
02350 }
02351

02355 }

02359 }

02363 }
02364 
02366 
02367 
02368 namespace uvm_ml {
02369 
02370   void uvm_ml_connect(const std::string & port_name, const std::string & export_name, bool map_transactions) {
02371         if (IN_ELABORATION()) return;
02372         if (! ml_tlm2_check_cross_registration(port_name, export_name)) return;
02373         if (uvm_ml_utils::quasi_static_construction_ended()) {
02374             unsigned result = uvm_ml_utils::do_connect(port_name, export_name);
02375             if(result == 0) return; // propagate error
02376             if (map_transactions == false) {
02377                 uvm_ml_utils::tlm2_turn_off_transaction_mapping(port_name, export_name);
02378             }
02379         } else {
02380             uvm_ml_utils::add_pending_uvm_ml_connect_call(port_name, export_name, map_transactions);
02381         }
02382     }
02383

02391   void uvm_ml_register_srv_providers(uvm_ml_srv_provider_struct * srv_providers)
02392   {
02393       bp_srv_provider_struct * bp_srv_providers;
02394 
02395       bp_srv_providers = (bp_srv_provider_struct *) (srv_providers);
02396       BP(register_srv_providers)(framework_id, bp_srv_providers);
02397   }
