02485 
02486 int uvm_ml_utils::get_pack_block_size() {
02487     return UVM_ML_PACKING_BLOCK_SIZE_INT;
02488 }
02489 
02490 int uvm_ml_utils::get_max_bits() {
02491   static int pack_block_size = get_pack_block_size();
02492   int size = BP(get_pack_max_size)(framework_id);
02493   if (size == -1) { // uninitilaized in backplane
02494     char* c = 0;
02495     c = getenv("UVM_ML_BITSIZE");
02496     if (c) {
02497       size = atoi(c);
02498     }
02499     if (size < pack_block_size) {
02500       size = pack_block_size;
02501     }
02502   }
02503   return size;
02504 }
02505 
02506 int round_bits(int nbits) {
02507   static unsigned pack_block_size = uvm_ml_utils::get_pack_block_size();
02508   //int i = (nbits - 1)/UVM_PACKING_BLOCK_SIZE + 1;
02509   //int n = i*UVM_PACKING_BLOCK_SIZE;
02510   int i = (nbits - 1)/pack_block_size + 1;
02511   int n = i*pack_block_size;
02512   return n;
02513 }
02514 
02515 int uvm_ml_utils::get_max_words() {
02516   static int max_bits = uvm_ml_utils::get_max_bits();
02517   static int round_max_bits = round_bits(max_bits);
02518   static int max_words = 1 + (round_max_bits - 1)/32;
02519   return max_words;
02520 }
02521 
02522 void uvm_ml_utils::fill_mlupo(MLUPO& vt, unsigned size, void* stream) {
02523   int nwords;
02524   vt.size = size;
02525   uvm_ml_stream_t val = (uvm_ml_stream_t)stream;
02526   nwords = size/UVM_ML_BLOCK_SIZE;
02527   int round_nbits = round_bits(nwords*32);
02528   int alloc_words = 1 + (round_nbits - 1)/32;
02529 
02530   // we could for simplicity also allocatethe max_words here, although
02531   // that is not necessary
02532  
02533   // we are always allocate mlupo in multiples of UVM_PACKING_BLOCK_SIZE;
02534   // not really necessary; optimize in future
02535 
02536   uvm_ml_packed_obj::allocate(&vt, alloc_words);
02537 
02538   memcpy(vt.val, val, nwords*sizeof(unsigned));
02539 }
02540 
02541 
02542 void uvm_ml_utils::allocate_mlupo(MLUPO* vt) {
02543   static int max_bits = uvm_ml_utils::get_max_bits();
02544 
02545   static int alloc_words = uvm_ml_utils::get_max_words();
02546    
02547 
02548   // we are always allocating mlupo in multiples of UVM_PACKING_BLOCK_SIZE;
02549   // not really necessary; optimize in future
02550 
02551   uvm_ml_packed_obj::allocate(vt, alloc_words);
02552 }
02553 
02554 unsigned uvm_ml_utils::copy_from_mlupo(const MLUPO& vt, void* stream) {
02555     int nwords;
02556     unsigned* ustream = (unsigned*)stream;
02557     nwords = vt.size/UVM_ML_BLOCK_SIZE;
02558     memcpy(ustream, vt.val, nwords*sizeof(unsigned));
02559 
02560     return vt.size;
02561 }
02562 
02563 
02564 uvm_ml_packed_obj static_mlupo;
02565 
02566 uvm_ml_packed_obj& uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo() {
02567   return static_mlupo;
02568 }
02569 
02570 std::queue<uvm_ml_packed_obj*> mlupo_free_q;
02571 
02572 uvm_ml_packed_obj* uvm_ml_utils::get_mlupo_from_pool() {
02573   uvm_ml_packed_obj* n = 0;
02574   int size = mlupo_free_q.size();
02575   if (size > 0) {
02576     n = mlupo_free_q.front();
02577     mlupo_free_q.pop();
02578     return n;
02579   }
02580   // allocate new mlupo
02581   //cout << "**************allocating new mlupo " << endl;
02582 #ifdef _NCSC_DEBUG
02583   dbginfo(U) << "**************allocating new mlupo " << endl;
02584 #endif
02585   n = new uvm_ml_packed_obj();
02586   return n;
02587 }
02588   
02589 void uvm_ml_utils::release_mlupo_to_pool(uvm_ml_packed_obj* n) {
02590   mlupo_free_q.push(n);
02591 }
02592 
02593 void uvm_ml_utils::register_static_top(const string & top_name) {
02594 
02595   if (IN_ELABORATION()) return; // don't attempt calling the backplane during static elaboration
02596 
02597   if (quasi_static_elaboration_started()) return; // Quasi-static tops should be registered separately
02598 
02599   if (std::find(static_top_names.begin(), static_top_names.end(), top_name) != static_top_names.end())
02600     return; // Already registered 
02601 
02602   if (BP(add_root_node)(framework_id,
02603                         get_next_top_id(),
02604                         top_name.c_str(),
02605                         top_name.c_str()) == (-1))
02606       SC_REPORT_ERROR(ML_UVM_RUN_TIME_ERROR_,"Duplicate top component instance name ");
02607 
02608   static_top_names.push_back(top_name);
02609 }
02610 
02611 unsigned int uvm_ml_utils::add_quasi_static_tree_node(sc_module * pmod) { 
02612     quasi_static_tree_nodes.push_back (pmod); 
02613     return static_top_names.size() + quasi_static_tree_nodes.size() - 1; 
02614 };
02615 
02617 
02623 class uvm_ml_tlm_connection_info {
02624 public:
02625     uvm_ml_tlm_connection_info(const std::string & port_name, const std::string & export_name, bool map_transactions = true):  
02626         m_port_name(port_name), m_export_name(export_name), m_map_transactions(map_transactions)
02627     {
02628     }
02629     std::string m_port_name;
02630     std::string m_export_name;
02631     bool m_map_transactions;
02632 };
02633 
02634 typedef std::vector<uvm_ml_tlm_connection_info*> uvm_ml_tlm_connection_vec;
02635 
02636 static uvm_ml_tlm_connection_vec* pending_uvm_ml_connect_calls = 0;
02637 
02638 unsigned uvm_ml_utils::do_connect (const std::string & port_name, const std::string & export_name) {
02639     //assert (bpProvidedAPI != NULL);
02640     if(bpProvidedAPI == NULL) {
02641       char msg[1024];
02642       sprintf(msg, "\nPort is '%s'; Export is '%s' \n", port_name.c_str(), export_name.c_str());
02643       UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: do_connect failed",msg);
02644       return 0; // propagate error 
02645     };
02646     return BP(connect)(framework_id,port_name.c_str(),export_name.c_str());
02647 }
02648 
02649 void uvm_ml_utils::add_pending_uvm_ml_connect_call(const std::string & port_name,
02650                                                    const std::string & export_name, 
02651                                                    bool map_transactions) {
02652   if (!pending_uvm_ml_connect_calls) {
02653     pending_uvm_ml_connect_calls = new uvm_ml_tlm_connection_vec;
02654   }
02655   uvm_ml_tlm_connection_info* info = 
02656       new uvm_ml_tlm_connection_info(port_name, export_name, map_transactions);
02657   pending_uvm_ml_connect_calls->push_back(info);
02658 }
02659 
02660 void uvm_ml_utils::tlm2_turn_off_transaction_mapping(const std::string & port_name, 
02661                                                 const std::string & export_name) {
02662     BP(turn_off_transaction_mapping)(framework_id, port_name.c_str());
02663     BP(turn_off_transaction_mapping)(framework_id, export_name.c_str());
02664 }
02665 
02666 int uvm_ml_utils::do_pending_uvm_ml_connect_calls() {
02667 
02668   int result = 1;
02669   if (pending_uvm_ml_connect_calls) {
02670 
02671       for (unsigned i = 0; i < pending_uvm_ml_connect_calls->size(); i++) {
02672           uvm_ml_tlm_connection_info* info = (*pending_uvm_ml_connect_calls)[i];
02673           result = uvm_ml_utils::do_connect(info->m_port_name, info->m_export_name);
02674           if (result && (info->m_map_transactions == false)) {
02675               tlm2_turn_off_transaction_mapping(info->m_port_name, info->m_export_name);
02676           }
02677       }
02678       pending_uvm_ml_connect_calls->clear();
02679   }
02680   return result;
02681 }
02682 
02683 // ///////////////////////
02684 
02685 void uvm_ml_tlm_trans::request_put(
02686   unsigned port_connector_id,
02687   MLUPO* arg 
02688 ) {
02689   unsigned call_id = fake_blocking_call_id++;
02690   unsigned done = 0;
02691   int disable = BP(request_put)(
02692     framework_id,
02693     port_connector_id,
02694     call_id,
02695     arg->size,
02696     arg->val,
02697     &done,
02698     &m_time_unit,
02699     &m_time_value
02700   );
02701   if (!done) {
02702     //SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_DONE_BIT_,"");
02703     void* p_call_id;
02704     // need to do the cast to unsigned long below before casting to pointer
02705     // because on 64 bit m/cs pointers are 64 bits, whereas unsigned is 32
02706     // bits; so casting from unsigned to pointer generates compiler warning;
02707     // unsigend long  matches the size of pointers on 32 bit and 64 bit m/cs
02708     p_call_id = (void *)(unsigned long)call_id;
02709     sc_event *e = new INVISIBLE_EVENT("uvm_fake_blocking");
02710     call_id_trans_dict.insert(p_call_id, e);
02711     sc_core::wait(*e);
02712     // we are here when the target adaptor has informed us via 
02713     // the backplane that the call has finished in it;
02714     // delete call_id and event ptrs
02715     delete e;
02716   }
02717   if (disable == 1) {
02718     // rule out the cases that 1) SC process initiated call (ECC) and child
02719     // SV is disabled; this is illegal at present
02720     // 2) e initiated call and somehow 1 is returned here
02721       uvm_ml::dpi_task_disabled();
02722   }
02723 }
02724 
02725 int uvm_ml_tlm_trans::nb_put(
02726   unsigned local_port_id, 
02727   MLUPO* val
02728 ) {
02729     return BP(nb_put)(
02730     framework_id,
02731     local_port_id,
02732     val->size,
02733     val->val,
02734     m_time_unit,
02735     m_time_value
02736   );
02737 }
02738 
02739 int uvm_ml_tlm_trans::can_put(unsigned local_port_id) {
02740     return BP(can_put)(framework_id,local_port_id, m_time_unit, m_time_value);
02741 }
02742 
02743 void uvm_ml_tlm_trans::notify_end_blocking(
02744   unsigned callback_adapter_id,
02745   unsigned call_id
02746 ) {
02747     BP(notify_end_blocking)(framework_id, callback_adapter_id, call_id, m_time_unit, m_time_value);
02748 }
02749 
02750 //
02751 
02752 void uvm_ml_tlm_trans::request_get(
02753   unsigned port_connector_id,
02754   MLUPO* arg
02755 ) {
02756   unsigned call_id = fake_blocking_call_id++;
02757   unsigned done = 0;
02758   int disable = BP(request_get)(
02759     framework_id,
02760     port_connector_id,
02761     call_id,
02762     &(arg->size),
02763     arg->val,
02764     &done,
02765     &m_time_unit,
02766     &m_time_value
02767   );
02768   if (!done) { // fake blocking
02769     //SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_DONE_BIT_,"");
02770     // new sc_event; hash <call_id , event>; wait on event;
02771     // later target will cause event to be triggered
02772     void* p_call_id;
02773     // need to do the cast to unsigned long below before casting to pointer
02774     // because on 64 bit m/cs pointers are 64 bits, whereas unsigned is 32
02775     // bits; so casting from unsigned to pointer generates compiler warning;
02776     // unsigend long  matches the size of pointers on 32 bit and 64 bit m/cs
02777     p_call_id = (void *)(unsigned long)call_id;
02778     sc_event* e = new INVISIBLE_EVENT("uvm_fake_blocking");
02779     call_id_trans_dict.insert(p_call_id, e);
02780     sc_core::wait(*e);
02781     // we are here when target adaptor has informed us via 
02782     // the backplane that the call has finished in it;
02783     // get the return value of get() from the backplane
02784     arg->size = BP(get_requested)(
02785       framework_id,
02786       port_connector_id,
02787       call_id,
02788       arg->val
02789     );
02790     // delete call_id and event ptrs
02791     delete e;
02792   }
02793   if (disable == 1) {
02794       uvm_ml::dpi_task_disabled();
02795   }
02796 }
02797 
02798 int uvm_ml_tlm_trans::nb_get(unsigned local_port_id, MLUPO* val) {
02799     return BP(nb_get)(
02800     framework_id, 
02801     local_port_id, 
02802     &(val->size),
02803     val->val,
02804     m_time_unit,
02805     m_time_value
02806   );
02807 }
02808 
02809 int uvm_ml_tlm_trans::can_get(unsigned local_port_id) {
02810     return BP(can_get)(framework_id, local_port_id, m_time_unit, m_time_value);
02811 }
02812 
02813 void uvm_ml_tlm_trans::request_peek(
02814   unsigned port_connector_id,
02815   MLUPO* arg
02816 ) {
02817   unsigned call_id = fake_blocking_call_id++;
02818   unsigned done = 0;
02819   int disable = BP(request_peek)(
02820     framework_id,
02821     port_connector_id,
02822     call_id,
02823     &(arg->size),
02824     arg->val,
02825     &done,
02826     &m_time_unit,
02827     &m_time_value
02828   );
02829   if (!done) {
02830     // new sc_event; hash <call_id , event>; wait on event;
02831     // later target will cause event to be triggered
02832     void* p_call_id;
02833     // need to do the cast to unsigned long below before casting to pointer
02834     // because on 64 bit m/cs pointers are 64 bits, whereas unsigned is 32
02835     // bits; so casting from unsigned to pointer generates compiler warning;
02836     // unsigend long  matches the size of pointers on 32 bit and 64 bit m/cs
02837     p_call_id = (void *)(unsigned long)call_id;
02838 
02839     sc_event* e = new INVISIBLE_EVENT("uvm_fake_blocking");
02840     call_id_trans_dict.insert(p_call_id, e);
02841     sc_core::wait(*e);
02842     // we are here when the target framework has informed us via 
02843     // the backplane that the call has finished in it;
02844     // get the return value of get() from the backplane
02845     arg->size = BP(peek_requested)(
02846       framework_id,
02847       port_connector_id,
02848       call_id,
02849       arg->val
02850     );
02851     // delete call_id and event ptrs
02852     delete e;
02853   }
02854   if (disable == 1) {
02855       uvm_ml::dpi_task_disabled();
02856   }
02857 }
02858 
02859 int uvm_ml_tlm_trans::nb_peek(unsigned local_port_id, MLUPO* val) {
02860     return BP(nb_peek)(
02861     framework_id, 
02862     local_port_id, 
02863     &(val->size),
02864     val->val,
02865     m_time_unit,
02866     m_time_value
02867   );
02868 }
02869 
02870 int uvm_ml_tlm_trans::can_peek(unsigned local_port_id) {
02871     return BP(can_peek)(framework_id, local_port_id, m_time_unit, m_time_value);
02872 }
02873 
02874 int uvm_ml_tlm_trans::request_transport(
02875   unsigned port_connector_id,
02876   MLUPO* req,
02877   MLUPO* rsp
02878 ) {
02879   unsigned call_id = fake_blocking_call_id++;
02880   unsigned done = 0;
02881   int disable = BP(request_transport)(
02882     framework_id,
02883     port_connector_id,
02884     call_id,
02885     req->size,
02886     req->val,
02887     &(rsp->size),
02888     rsp->val,
02889     &done,
02890     &m_time_unit,
02891     &m_time_value
02892   );
02893   if (!done) {
02894     //SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_DONE_BIT_,"");
02895     // new sc_event; hash <call_id , event>; wait on event;
02896     // later target will cause event to be triggered
02897     void* p_call_id;
02898     // need to do the cast to unsigned long below before casting to pointer
02899     // because on 64 bit m/cs pointers are 64 bits, whereas unsigned is 32
02900     // bits; so casting from unsigned to pointer generates compiler warning;
02901     // unsigend long  matches the size of pointers on 32 bit and 64 bit m/cs
02902     p_call_id = (void *)(unsigned long)call_id;
02903 
02904     sc_event* e = new INVISIBLE_EVENT("uvm_fake_blocking");
02905 
02906     call_id_trans_dict.insert(p_call_id, e);
02907     sc_core::wait(*e);
02908     // we are here when target adaptor has informed us via
02909     // the backplane that the call has finished in it;
02910     // get the return value of get() from the backplane
02911     rsp->size = BP(transport_response)(
02912       framework_id,
02913       port_connector_id,
02914       call_id,
02915       rsp->val
02916     );
02917     // delete call_id and event ptrs
02918     delete e;
02919   }
02920   if (disable == 1) {
02921       uvm_ml::dpi_task_disabled();
02922   }
02923 
02924   return 0;
02925 }
02926 
02927 void uvm_ml_tlm_trans::write(
02928   unsigned local_port_id, 
02929   MLUPO* val
02930 ) {
02931     BP(write)(
02932     framework_id,
02933     local_port_id,
02934     val->size,
02935     val->val,
02936     m_time_unit,
02937     m_time_value
02938   );
02939 }
